Mitch Stapleton

Writer // Musician // Programmer

About Me

Mitch is a recent Physics graduate based in Nottingham trying to figure it all out. When he's not busy recording increasingly preposterous drum covers or telling people what to think about video games, he's often hammering away codes at the keys of his trusty laptop, or working his day job as an Interoperability Analyst for the NHS in North West London.
